channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Appeals Court Upholds U.S. Ban of TikTok
item.description: A three-judge panel ruled Congress has the power to shut down the Chinese-backed app in the U.S. because of national security concerns.

item.title: Foreign leaders criticized Trump. Now they’re courting him.

item.title: Nvidia Partner Ooredoo Eyes Data Center Acquisitions Amid AI Push, CEO Says

item.title: Harris is pounding Trump on fascism. Some Dems think that’s a mistake.
item.description: Harris has ratcheted up her warnings about the dangers of a second Trump term in recent weeks.

item.title: You’d be Wrong to Assume Sanctuary Cities Actually Want Any Help

item.title: Trump hesitates to personally lobby for endangered Cabinet picks

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on Rubrik , Vodafone U.K.’s merger with Three and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Trump voters feel very differently about things now that he’s won, our new poll shows

item.title: Cabinet picks used to falter over far milder questionable conduct
item.description: Past nominees failed or withdrew over unpaid taxes or minor drug use from years ago. Today’s choices face more serious allegations.

item.title: Just Exactly Whose Interest Is This Mayor Representing?

item.title: It’s still the economy: What TV ads tell us about each campaign’s closing message
item.description: The final paid messages: Economy, culture wars and character.

item.title: There’s a Reason Harris’ Campaign Is Locked in on Quick Fixes
item.description: The Democratic nominee isn’t campaigning much on the Biden administration’s bigger, slower-moving policies.

item.title: Zelensky meets with Trump in Paris as he tries to build support for Ukraine
item.description: The meeting marks the first time Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has joined President-elect Donald Trump in-person since the U.S. election.

item.title: He Investigates the Internet's Most Vicious Hackers---from a Secret Location
item.description: In the increasingly dangerous world of cybercrime, Brian Krebs faces threats, manipulation and the odd chess challenge.

item.title: The Secret Weapon Helping Businesses Get Results From AI: Humans
item.description: It turns out the latest machines need us as much as we need them.
